sectfull distance. Remus quickly came back to a
close-quarter position prep=
ared for the next attack. In the heat of
the battle Remus was thinking abou=
t Scorpornok's tail: if his attack 
wasn't powerfull enough, his damaged sh=
oulder could meant the end for
him. He was hoping to finished this before R=
azorwing arrived.
